name: Neon City Riders: Evergray's Quest
description:
HELLO KIDDO!

WE'RE GLAD YOU CAME ALL THIS WAY TO TRY OUT THIS HUMBLE AND SHORT PREQUEL TO NEON CITY RIDERS.

IN THIS STORY, YOU'LL TAKE THE ROLE OF EVERGRAY, AN OLD-MAN FED UP WITH THE VIOLENCE AND INJUSTICES OF NEON CITY WITH THE MISSION OF FINDING SOMEONE STRONG ENOUGH TO HELP HIM DEFEAT THE SUPER-POWERED GANGS.

CONTROLS
  • [START / ENTER] Start the game
  • [A BUTTON / J KEY] Interact
  • [D-PAD / WASD] Move
WHAT IS NEON CITY RIDERS?

IS AN ACTION-ADVENTURE VIDEO GAME WHERE YOU CONTROL RICK, A MASKED VIGILANTE FED UP WITH THE INJUSTICE AND RIOTS CAUSED BY THE SUPER-POWERED GANGS IN THE DECAYING FUTURISTIC NEON CITY. THIS SMALL PREQUEL (EVERGRAY'S QUEST) IS A FREE CONTENT DESIGNED TO ENHANCE YOUR EXPERIENCE BY SHOWING YOU THE PREVIOUS EVENTS TO THE ORIGINAL GAME. 

NOTE: THE GAME QUALITY AND MECHANICS OF THIS PREQUEL DOESN'T REFLECT THE QUALITY, MECHANICS AND CONTENT QUANTITY OF THE NEON CITY RIDERS ACTUAL GAME.

IF YOU ARE INTERESTED, YOU CAN CONTINUE YOUR ADVENTURE AT NINTENDO SWITCH, XBOX ONE, PS4 AND PC AT NEONCITYRIDERS.COM !

CONSOLE READY!

THE COOLEST PART OF THIS CHAPTER IS THAT YOU CAN PLAY IT IN YOUR ORIGINAL CONSOLE! FEEL FREE TO DOWNLOAD THE ROM TO INSTALL IT IN YOUR FLASH CART!
